Summary: Saw a bright white light with starburst-like yellow & red edges
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile alone in my living room I happened to look out my picture window and saw this object in the distant dark sky. It was hovering in place over a hilly treeline approximately 7-9 miles away. I immediately observed it through my field glasses, and in about 30 seconds it began to slowly move at about a slightly downward angle to the east from its position in the northwest sky. Even though some distance away, the nucleus of the object still appeared approximately the circumference of a slightly wabbling and slight shape changing circumference of a pencil eraser with yellow and red colors bursting from its outer edges. The center of the object was a very bright white color. I am a former career Airman, and from my knowledge of things that fly, this did not appear to be any kind of identifiable aircraft.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in McCleary
There were no other sightings in McCleary on or around October 15th 2007
